ix.iface.ui.tree
Class EditableTree

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  ix.iface.ui.tree.IXTree
                      ix.iface.ui.tree.EditableTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class EditableTree
extends IXTree
implements java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner

An IXTree that can be edited. Mostly relays to model, except showing and selecting nodes.

See Also:
Serialized Form

showUserNode

public void showUserNode(java.lang.Object userNode,
                         java.lang.Object oldUserNode)
Scroll and open the tree to make the given node visible. The old node may have been selected before, so if it is an ancestor, show the version of userNode that descends from it.
